messages.name: SMTP delivery delays (AWS SES)
messages.message:
We are currently experiencing delayed email delivery caused by an upstream issue with AWS SES.
What this means for you:
\- Transactional emails may arrive later than usual
\- No data has been lost
\- No action is required from your side
Our team is monitoring the situation and will update this message as soon as we have more information.
Last update: 18 Dec 2025, 15:30 CET
